CustomField.formula: (Funded_amount_in_progress_prelisting__c / If( Not(IsBlank(Percentage_of_financin_Manualg__c)), Percentage_of_financin_Manualg__c, Min( percentage_of_financing__c, Max_advance_amount_percentage__c))) - total_invoice_value_in_progress__c
CustomField.label: Invoice Amount Prelisting
